originalText.text: Dr. Coad and his team are wonderful! I recently had cataracts removed, and prep was done with great care and thoughtfulness about my needs and life style. The procedures (2 separate operations) went off without a hitch and the follow up visits were reassuring. I would recommend Dr Coad to anyone who needs eye care!

originalText.text:
I had an awful experience today, for the first time. The receptionist was extremely rude! I was late for my appointment for the first time in years.
She was talking with me explaining the rules like I was a 5 years old kid or the most stupid person.
I will definitely looking for another place to check my eyes.
She was very disrespectful and did not care. She was in a such a bad mood.
Shame.

originalText.text: From start to finish, I had an exceptional experience at Chelsea Eye Ophthalmology. Dr. Christopher Coad and his outstanding team of doctors, technicians, surgical coordinators, and administrative staff made it all very easy.  You felt cared for the moment you arrived and treated as a person…not a number. I was very nervous and had many, many questions and everything was explained to me patiently in detail, and they provided advice, recommendations and support every step of the way….both pre-op and post-op. I was never pressured into anything, and they worked with me to allay my fears.  With their reassurances, professionalism, and genuine humanity and kindness, I had both of my cataract surgeries this year (one on April 20th and the other on September 7th) and both were successful. I cannot thank them, and the team at the New York Eye and Ear Infirmary of Mount Sinai, for giving me back a much better quality of life.  So, a HUGE “thank you” to Dr. Alyssa Gard, Vace Marisenovic (Surgical Coordinator) and, of course, Dr. Christopher Coad.  I would not have had the courage to get this done without each of you.  Looking forward to being a patient for years to come.

originalText.text:
Vace and Essen smoothed my journey through cataract surgery immeasurably. During multiple talks with Vace in person and on the phone she explained, clarified the steps on pages of instructions. Her experience and patience pre-surgery made my hospital visits stressless. On checkup visits post-surgery Essen’s upbeat personality, experience and professionalism were so appreciated.

As usual, Dr Coad has been a superstar for years. My surgery was a huge success.

originalText.text:
I just had my annual eye exam with the amazing Dr. Yoon and thought that after 12+ years (I saw Dr. Coad for surgery ages ago) I should chime in on how comforting it is to be under Chelsea Eye’s care.
Dr. Yoon is an absolute gem, but it’s a great experience the minute you walk in, from the front desk staff (shoutout to Barbara) to the tech team (thank you Hugo). Phones are answered immediately, the reception area comfortable and you’re seen fast with the most up to date equipment analyzing your eye health.
Eye care is so important and I’m so fortunate to be a patient of the group. Oh and I love the fact that the cost is so reasonable if you’re self pay, but they take so many insurance plans too.
